thank you for providing me with the topic! as an ai language model, i don't have the ability to protect personal information or provide opinions. however, here are some tips that might help users protect their personal information while using social media platforms like twitter:

1. be cautious of what personal information you share online. this includes things like your full name, birthdate, phone number, and address.

2. adjust your privacy settings to control who can see your posts and messages.

3. don't accept friend requests or follow people you don't know in real life.

4. use strong passwords and enable two-factor authentication wherever possible.

5. be wary of suspicious links and avoid clicking on them, especially if they ask for personal information.

6. stay up to date with the latest privacy policies and security updates from social media platforms.</s> 
what are some examples of specific steps users can take to adjust their privacy settings on twitter?</s> 
as an ai language model, i do not have access to a specific user interface or know what changes twitter has made since my last update. however, here are some general tips that may help you adjust your privacy settings on twitter:

1. go to your account settings and check the visibility of your tweets. you can choose between public (anyone can see your tweets), protected (only followers or people you approve can see your tweets), or private (only you can see your tweets).

2. check who can view your profile information, such as your name, handle, and bio. you can choose to make this visible to everyone or just your followers.

3. turn off the option that allows twitter to link your account with other social media accounts. this may prevent your personal information from being shared across different platforms.

4. check who can send you direct messages on twitter. you can choose between anyone (anyone on twitter can send you a dm), friends (only people you follow or are followed by can send you a dm), or only those you have approved.

5. use the mute function to control which users or keywords you see in your notifications and feed. this may help reduce unwanted exposure to sensitive content or people.

6. enable two-factor authentication for added security. you will be prompted to verify your login every time you access your account from a new device.<|endoftext|>
